review: If you cant afford the Roku 2 or 3, then this is your best option. Beware that just like any streaming device that is wireless, it will be slow, sometimes laggy and such. Thats why i would always recommend going with the wired Roku 2 or 3 (the extra processing power inside helps too).As for deciding between Roku, Apple, Amazon and just about every company jumping into this, would recommend Roku. Great interface, easy controls and no issues
author: MJK "mikeklement.com"

review: I was so excited when I first got my roku streaming stick. I worked great up until a week ago. My channels started getting error codes and it resets ALL the time. I wish I would have saved my money and stuck with my Google Chromecast. customer Service is great but they weren't able to resolve my issue with it restarting all the time. And of course I can't return it to Amazon. Roku wants to charge me additional money to cover customer support. So frustrated.
